page.title: 09Sponsored Walk, Manningtree
page.content: Each year in the summer term Manningtree school holds a sponsored walk when all the pupils in the school and the staff walk to raise money. At first it was alright we started off clean and dry then the weather became very wet sometimes it rained making us drenched. We were also very often near rivers which increased the mud. Sometimes we were up to our knees in mud! We walked to raise money for the swimming pool. We raised about 1400 pounds, after walking 10 miles through Dedham, Flatford and back round to the school. By Rachel, Lyn, Debbie and Fiona. Aged between 12 and 15.
